source:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Giritt's eyes light up at your arrival.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
トメラの村の外れにいるギリットは、冒険者を見て目を輝かせている。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_TODO_00<tab>Use the box of custom-made explosives to blow up the tempting bedrock.
target: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8F1501 /var>を使い<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EACE801 /var>を爆破

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the chunks of twinkling ore to Giritt.

TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! Oh, you're that <var 09 E948 ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((dwarf)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) /var> from...some faraway land. Tell me, friend: do you like explosions?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_000ラリホー！
お前、
なあなあ、お前、爆弾は好きか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_001<tab>...That nervous thrill when you toss a bomb you've just made? The <var 1A 02 /var>satisfaction<var 1A 01 /var> of shattering a shelf of bedrock into tiny little pieces!? I pity the poor souls who've never known such joy!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_001一から作った爆弾を、投げる瞬間のあの緊張感！
硬い岩盤が、いとも簡単にはじけ飛んじまう、あの破壊力！
その良さがわからないなんて、人生損してるぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_002<tab>You're a worldly <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, ain't you? Promise not to lecture me about “danger” and “scaring the beardlings” like my milksop neighbors, and I'll let you test my latest batch of explosives!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_002外の世界を知っているお前なら、この村のドワーフ連中みたいに、
危ないだの怖いだの、情けないことは言わねえよなあ？
ほら、あたしが作った爆弾、お前にわけてやるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_003<tab>Take these beauties, and throw one at the bedrock east of the village. The explosion's a reward in itself, of course, but if you're lucky, you might also hit a seam of ore. Bring any promising chunks back to me, and I'll let you know what you've found!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_003これで、村の東にある「」でも爆破してこいよ！
あの辺りでは、キラキラ光る鉱石がたまに見つかるんだ。
何か見つけたら持って来いよ、あたしが鑑定してやるからさ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_004<tab>Go and blow up some bedrock! There's a tempting outcrop just east of the village─toss a bomb at it, admire the destruction, then bring back any ore you find!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_004お前に渡した「」で、
村の東にある「」を爆破してこいよ！
何か見つけたら、あたしが鑑定してやるからさ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_021<tab>Oh! Oooh! Do you know what this is...!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_021お、おお、おおおお……！？
こ、こいつは……！！

source:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_022...Iron ore.
It's a bit shiny, aye, but otherwise naught special for this area.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_022……ただの鉄鉱石だな。
まぁ、あの辺りならこんなもんだろ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_023<tab>Now, for the important part! How was the BOOM!? Wasn't it just the most amazing feeling ever!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_023そ・れ・よ・り・も！
あたしお手製の爆弾はどうだった？
爆破すんのは気持ちよかっただろ！？　最高だろ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_A1_000_002<tab>I thought I'd lose an eye...
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_024<tab>See! I knew you'd appreciate a good explosion!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_024そうだろ、そうだろ！！
いやぁやっぱり、わかるやつにはわかるんだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_025<tab>Ugh, you sound like my mother. I thought someone like you would... Well, never mind.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_025なんだよ、お前も、ほかのドワーフ連中と同じかよ。
ちぇっ……まあいいや。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_026<tab>Here─a few coins for the ore. Thanks for testing the bombs!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_026ほら、持ってきてくれた鉄鉱石の代金だ。
付き合ってくれてありがとな！
